name: action-terraform-plan
description: A GitHub action to run Terraform validate and plan
author: Canadian Digital Service

scripts.policy: opa build -t wasm -e 'terraform' -e 'terraform/no_changes' -e 'terraform/resource_changes' -e 'terraform/output_changes' ./policy && tar -xzf ./bundle.tar.gz /policy.wasm && mv policy.wasm ./policy && rm bundle.tar.gz
scripts.pre-commit: npm run format:write & npm run build
